comment.author: 41615503@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Paratroopers, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content:
SS Index gives an Irving Sadernsky (1918-2000) and a Nathan Sadernsky (1923-1984), both from Connecticut.

An Irene Sadernsky Figarsky was in the class of 1945 at Norwich Free Academy in Connecticut, and served on the school's Jubilee Committee in 2005.
